headline: Britain and E.U. Smile, But Expect Gritted Teeth
abstract: Britain and the European Union now face the all-but-impossible task of drawing up a comprehensive trade deal in a year’s time.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Like ex-spouses who have just signed divorce papers but not yet begun the ugly business of dividing their possessions, Britain and the European Union are tiptoeing around each other as the year begins, desperate to keep their dealings civil even as they gird for the unpleasantness to come.
